contamination_sites_bed.name: contamination_sites_bed
contamination_sites_bed.description: .Bed file for markers used in this analysis,format(chr	pos-1	pos	refAllele	altAllele)
contamination_sites_bed.help: .Bed file for markers used in this analysis,format(chr	pos-1	pos	refAllele	altAllele)

contamination_sites_ud.name: contamination_sites_ud
contamination_sites_ud.description: .UD matrix file from SVD result of genotype matrix
contamination_sites_ud.help: .UD matrix file from SVD result of genotype matrix

input_pe_mates_list.name: input_pe_mates_list
input_pe_mates_list.description: List of input R2 paired end fastq reads
input_pe_mates_list.help: List of input R2 paired end fastq reads

input_pe_reads_list.name: input_pe_reads_list
input_pe_reads_list.description: List of input R1 paired end fastq reads
input_pe_reads_list.help: List of input R1 paired end fastq reads

input_se_reads_list.name: input_se_reads_list
input_se_reads_list.description: List of input singlie end fastq reads
input_se_reads_list.help: List of input singlie end fastq reads

knownsites.name: knownsites
knownsites.description: List of files containing known polymorphic sites used to exclude regions around known polymorphisms from analysis
knownsites.help: List of files containing known polymorphic sites used to exclude regions around known polymorphisms from analysis

knownsites_indexes.name: knownsites_indexes
knownsites_indexes.description: Corresponding indexes for the knownsites. File position in list must match with its corresponding VCF's position in the knownsites file list. For example, if the first file in the knownsites list is 1000G_omni2.5.hg38.vcf.gz then the first item in this list must be 1000G_omni2.5.hg38.vcf.gz.tbi. Optional, but will save time/cost on indexing.
knownsites_indexes.help: Corresponding indexes for the knownsites. File position in list must match with its corresponding VCF's position in the knownsites file list. For example, if the first file in the knownsites list is 1000G_omni2.5.hg38.vcf.gz then the first item in this list must be 1000G_omni2.5.hg38.vcf.gz.tbi. Optional, but will save time/cost on indexing.

reference_tar.name: reference_tar
reference_tar.description: Tar file containing a reference fasta and, optionally, its complete set of associated indexes (samtools, bwa, and picard)
reference_tar.help: Tar file containing a reference fasta and, optionally, its complete set of associated indexes (samtools, bwa, and picard)

wgs_calling_interval_list.name: wgs_calling_interval_list
wgs_calling_interval_list.description: WGS interval list used to aid scattering Haplotype caller
wgs_calling_interval_list.help: WGS interval list used to aid scattering Haplotype caller

wgs_coverage_interval_list.name: wgs_coverage_interval_list
wgs_coverage_interval_list.description: An interval list file that contains the positions to restrict the wgs metrics assessment
wgs_coverage_interval_list.help: An interval list file that contains the positions to restrict the wgs metrics assessment

wgs_evaluation_interval_list.name: wgs_evaluation_interval_list
wgs_evaluation_interval_list.description: Target intervals to restrict gvcf metric analysis (for VariantCallingMetrics)
wgs_evaluation_interval_list.help: Target intervals to restrict gvcf metric analysis (for VariantCallingMetrics)

wxs_bait_interval_list.name: wxs_bait_interval_list
wxs_bait_interval_list.description: An interval list file that contains the locations of the WXS baits used (for HsMetrics)
wxs_bait_interval_list.help: An interval list file that contains the locations of the WXS baits used (for HsMetrics)

wxs_target_interval_list.name: wxs_target_interval_list
wxs_target_interval_list.description: An interval list file that contains the locations of the WXS targets (for HsMetrics)
wxs_target_interval_list.help: An interval list file that contains the locations of the WXS targets (for HsMetrics)

input_pe_rgs_list.name: input_pe_rgs_list
input_pe_rgs_list.description: List of RG strings to use in PE processing
input_pe_rgs_list.help: List of RG strings to use in PE processing

input_se_rgs_list.name: input_se_rgs_list
input_se_rgs_list.description: List of RG strings to use in SE processing
input_se_rgs_list.help: List of RG strings to use in SE processing

min_alignment_score.name: min_alignment_score
min_alignment_score.description: For BWA MEM, Don't output alignment with score lower than INT. This option only affects output.
min_alignment_score.help: For BWA MEM, Don't output alignment with score lower than INT. This option only affects output.

output_basename.name: output_basename
output_basename.description: String to use as the base for output filenames
output_basename.help: String to use as the base for output filenames

run_agg_metrics.name: run_agg_metrics
run_agg_metrics.description: AlignmentSummaryMetrics, GcBiasMetrics, InsertSizeMetrics, QualityScoreDistribution, and SequencingArtifactMetrics will be collected. Recommended for both WXS and WGS inputs.
run_agg_metrics.help: AlignmentSummaryMetrics, GcBiasMetrics, InsertSizeMetrics, QualityScoreDistribution, and SequencingArtifactMetrics will be collected. Recommended for both WXS and WGS inputs.

run_bam_processing.name: run_bam_processing
run_bam_processing.description: BAM processing will be run. Requires: input_bam_list
run_bam_processing.help: BAM processing will be run. Requires: input_bam_list

run_gvcf_processing.name: run_gvcf_processing
run_gvcf_processing.description: gVCF will be generated. Requires: dbsnp_vcf, contamination_sites_bed, contamination_sites_mu, contamination_sites_ud, wgs_calling_interval_list, wgs_evaluation_interval_list
run_gvcf_processing.help: gVCF will be generated. Requires: dbsnp_vcf, contamination_sites_bed, contamination_sites_mu, contamination_sites_ud, wgs_calling_interval_list, wgs_evaluation_interval_list

run_hs_metrics.name: run_hs_metrics
run_hs_metrics.description: HsMetrics will be collected. Only recommended for WXS inputs. Requires: wxs_bait_interval_list, wxs_target_interval_list
run_hs_metrics.help: HsMetrics will be collected. Only recommended for WXS inputs. Requires: wxs_bait_interval_list, wxs_target_interval_list

run_pe_reads_processing.name: run_pe_reads_processing
run_pe_reads_processing.description: PE reads processing will be run. Requires: input_pe_reads_list, input_pe_mates_list, input_pe_rgs_list
run_pe_reads_processing.help: PE reads processing will be run. Requires: input_pe_reads_list, input_pe_mates_list, input_pe_rgs_list

run_se_reads_processing.name: run_se_reads_processing
run_se_reads_processing.description: SE reads processing will be run. Requires: input_se_reads_list, input_se_rgs_list
run_se_reads_processing.help: SE reads processing will be run. Requires: input_se_reads_list, input_se_rgs_list

run_wgs_metrics.name: run_wgs_metrics
run_wgs_metrics.description: WgsMetrics will be collected. Only recommended for WGS inputs. Requires: wgs_coverage_interval_list
run_wgs_metrics.help: WgsMetrics will be collected. Only recommended for WGS inputs. Requires: wgs_coverage_interval_list
